    • Uses of Serializer in com.jbion.utils.xml.serialization.serializers

      Subclasses of Serializer in com.jbion.utils.xml.serialization.serializers 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ArraySerializer<T>
      An XML serializer for arrays of objects from the type variable's class.
      class  DateArraySerializer
      An XML serializer for arrays of dates expressed as Longs.
      class  DateSerializer
      An XML serializer for dates expressed as Longs in milliseconds.
      class  DurationArraySerializer
      An XML serializer for arrays of durations expressed as Longs in milliseconds.
      class  DurationSerializer
      An XML serializer for durations expressed as Longs in milliseconds.
      class  EnumSerializer<T extends Enum<T>>
      An XML serializer for any enum type, using Enum.toString() and Enum.valueOf(Class, String).
      class  ObjectSerializer<T>
      An XML serializer for any class whose non-transient fields have a corresponding Serializer.
      class  SimpleSerializer<T>
      An XML serializer for any class simple enough to be serialized as a String .
      Constructors in com.jbion.utils.xml.serialization.serializers with parameters of type Serializer 
      Constructor and Description
      ArraySerializer(Serializer<T> componentSerializer)
      Creates an ArraySerializer for arrays of objects that can be serialized by componentSerializer.
